body.name: Allewie Upholstered King Size Platform Bed Frame with 4 Storage Drawers and Headboard, Diamond Stitched Button Tufted, Mattress Foundation with Wooden Slats Support, No Box Spring Needed, Dark Grey
features: All-in-One Package: This storage bed frame comes in only one box with the complete accessories you need to assemble now.
Space-saving Functionality: With four storage drawers underneath, this king platform bed frame offers perfect storage space for bed sheets, accessories, off-season clothing, etc.
Lavish & Modern: Upholstered in linen fabric with a button-tufted and Diamond-stitched surface, this deluxe platform king size bed will add sophisticated style to any bedroom.
Adjustable Headboard: The headboard of this king size bed frame can be adjusted to 42.5 or 44.9 inches in height, suitable for a 6-14 inches mattress.
No box spring needed: Designed with strong wood slats support, this king bed frame with drawers does not require a box spring or any other additional foundations.

Does this ship in one box? Yes, one very heavy box. What are the dimensions of storage drawers? Do drawer wheels work on the carpet? The dimensions of the drawers are shown in one of the pictures provided and the wheels would definitely work on carpet. What kind of mattress does it fit? It can fit in all kinds of mattresses with thicknesses between 6-14 inches and does not need a box spring. What tools are needed to put the bed together? All tools you needed will be sent with the bed so you don’t need to get any tools from the store. How easy is it to assemble the bed? This is extremely easy. There are instructions that are fairly easy to follow even a rookie would finish the work within two hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! Good quality, very sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: This bed is so much sturdier than I expected. The box is very long and quite heavy, need two people to move it but it’s packaged very well. The bed was relatively easy to put together, with a few minor issues to note. Two of the pieces were labeled incorrectly which caused me to have to take it apart again and swap them. When attaching the legs to the headboard, make sure the holes in the legs are facing the outside edge of the bed. If they are not facing correctly, yours may be mislabeled as well so you will want to watch the holes on the diagram when putting it together. Other than that, bed was super easy to assemble. If you have a drill with a hex head the assembly goes much faster. Overall, extremely pleased with the quality, look, and overall value. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, sturdy, quiet
reviews.reviewText: I had a large bed that wouldn't fit in my new place. This fit the bill perfectly. Gave me additional storage space, simple, classic, design. Headboard stays in places, mattress supports are stored attached with plastic end pieces = quiet, no squeaking when moving around. Has supported around 500lbs body weight (me, partner, child or pets)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for $, but HEAVY & Semi-Difficult to assemble without help!
reviews.reviewText: For the cost, this was a great purchase. I was worried when I realized how heavy the box was(BIG 100ish lbs) Some reviews said parts were missing & customer service required them to return the entire shipment back, and/or weren’t very helpful in sending missing items either quickly or at all. The way this box was packaged, there would have been NO WAY to pull every item out to check for missing parts & then repackage it how it came, get it to a return store with hope the next one wouldn’t encounter the same issue. I think it would have been better if parts were shipped in two smaller boxes. Needed a hand truck to move myself so if you have stairs or live in an apartment.. consider building the parts first then moving it piece by piece.LUCKILY, I had every piece & I’m very happy with the quality at this price point. I ordered a Gray Queen frame. Assembly by myself took about 3.5-4hrs. If I had an extra person, I think full build would’ve been 1.5hrs. Every bolt is hand cranked, & lot of screws with the included Allen wrench. Wish I could have used a drill.. but instructions we’re pretty clear cut & easy to follow. NEED to use them.Can’t give a full 5 stars because 1) I haven’t filled the under the bed drawers yet. On carpet & with the strange little drawer latch holes, & metal wire baskets, not sure if I’ll get annoyed to store daily items like clothes or just use them for occasional storage. I feel like the latch holes could be designed better? The drawers aren’t on tracks. They just kind of float flush to the edge of the frame. 2) wooden slats are VERY cheap. Almost balsa wood I think? Putting the plastic connector ends on caused some splitting.. and a few splinters. stronger wood & end connectors would make it way better. Not confident in long term use that they’ll hold up or survive multiple disassembly, but does the job for now.Future moves will 100% be easier than first time build. I plan on keeping this for a guest bedroom down the road. Would be great for older kids to young adults like myself. Too much weight or jumping/ bouncing may not hold up long term, but for under $200 & a couple years of use for a cute bed frame.. definitely would recommend. (If you’re willing to take the 30% risk of a big item that’s near impossible to return if it shows up to you with missing parts or damage.) Also, it’s low to the ground, so if you’re into higher beds or use a box frames, this product probably won’t be a good fit for you. Overall, great bed for the money. Just be aware of your needs. Felt like I was gambling $200 to either receive a good deal or a major headache & CS nightmare.. haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Took a little time to put together but the instructions were clear. Looks great. I love that the storage drawers have a latch. While I wouldn’t use the drawers for everyday use- it’s perfect for storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Practical
reviews.reviewText: This platform bed won my heart. Although assembly took some time, I'm not the handiest person. The stylish design and ample storage were worth the effort. It seamlessly replaced my old bed, offering both comfort and practicality. A delightful addition to my bedroom space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very stylish has a nice modern look , very sturdy good quality materials , amazing price point . Took a while to put together but all instructions were very precise and clear. Love this bed!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed only one thing I didn't like.
reviews.reviewText: The bed is sturdy, I had my partner put it together he said it was easy to put together. The bed is very nice, clean looking. The only thing I think was a bit cheap was the drawers. They are wire and very cheap feeling, but that's really the only flaw that I can see. I would recommend the bed however. Its still great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product is good but assemble is a nightmare
reviews.reviewText: The price is decent for a king size bed, and it's sturdy and the quality is good as well. The only downside is there were missing pieces in the product so we cannot assemble the drawers fully. We contacted the brand owner and they responded very slow (2 -3 days) and asked us for the order number, we gave the Amazon order number (that's the only one we have) and they responded please contact Amazon. Amazon shipped another bed w/o any cost to us and we got the missing pieces and then Amazon picked up the 2nd bed. It just a big hassle to move the bed up and down to our 9th floor. Pretty satisfied on How Amazon responded to this case but feel disappointed to the brand owner.
Se ve bonito pero la estructura en sí medio frágil. Ojalá y dure
